ComicInfo.Title: Book of Shadows
ComicInfo.Summary: Charmed is one of the longest and most popular fantasy shows ever. Now Zenescope continues the amazing series that chronicles the life of everyone's favorite trio of witches. This sourcebook serves as a prequel to the comic book series and is a must for fans of the show or anyone who wants to catch up on the Charmed universe. Don't miss out on getting this special #0 issue which is sure to be a collector's item. Features a two covers--including 1 photo cover--and a special cover price of only $1.99!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-28 22:07:46. [CVDB201543] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 12:55:19. [Issue ID 763244]
